name: 中英筆譯（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【TIC9002  中英筆譯（一）】
description: 本課程以實際譯案作為授課內容，介紹翻譯的基本原理，並增進學生的實務經驗，並學習如何管理及執行譯案。
goals: 增加翻譯實務經驗，提升翻譯技巧及熟悉管理及執行譯案的技巧。
運用所學理論，判斷適合的翻譯策略並了解如何搜尋譯案相關領域知識。
syllabus:
Week 1:          Introduction & Course Overview

Week 2:          What is translation?

Week 3:          Basic Skills: Read like an Expert—Annotating, Summarizing, Analyzing

Week 4:          Close Reading and Translation: Beginning with the Small Things, Reading Parallel Texts

Week 5:          General Translation Skills and Techniques

Week 6:          Translation Skills & Practice: General Texts I

Week 7:          Translation Skills & Practice: General Texts II

Week 8:          Translation Skills & Practice: General Texts III

Week 9:          Translation Skills & Practice: General Texts IV

Week 10:        Midterm Exam

Week 11:        Discuss Midterm Exam

Week 12:        Academic Translation I

Week 13:        Academic Translation II

Week 14:        Subtitle Translation I

Week 15:        Subtitle Translation II  

Week 16:        Final Project Presentations

methodologies.note: 講解翻譯概念與理論及翻譯注意事項
透過開放式討論及互動學習
如何指出並解決翻譯問題為課堂討論重點
課程設計本身即為合作學習模式
課程目標之一在於完成實際翻譯任務
利用 Dropbox、Google Drive 等平台協作，並以投影機討論

prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【TIC9002  中英筆譯（一）】
